props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by `asChild`.

props.name: asChild
props.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

Read our [Composition](https://akar.vinicunca.dev/core/guides/composition) guide for more details.

props.name: autoSaveId
props.description: Unique id used to auto-save group arrangement via `localStorage`.

props.name: id
props.description: Group id; falls back to `useId` when not provided.

props.name: keyboardResizeBy
props.description: Step size when arrow key was pressed.

props.name: storage
props.description: Custom storage API; defaults to localStorage

events.name: layout
events.description: Event handler called when group layout changes
